Summary: Orange Fireball there one second then descends and disappears.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fairfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailswas positioning a bar at the bottom of my patio doors and when i looked up at the sky at what would be my eye level i saw a orange fire ball, in the sky. it then zoomed towards earth\horizon in the direction of 7th rd ne at extremely fast speed and disappeared. tried to convince myself it was a falling star, but have never seen a falling star like that! really spooked me. only lasted 2-3 seconds.
